quotes.quote: A loving woman finds heaven or hell on the day she is made a bride.
A young bride is like a plucked flower; but a guilty wife is like a flower that had been walked over.
A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting.
The bride, the white bride today a maiden, tomorrow a wife.
On the wedding day, the bride is always on cloud nine because she knows that from this day onward the groom will be dancing only to the tune of her blown musical rhyme.
In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
A young bride can put on makeup at 6 in the morning and look fabulous at midnight.
The true beauty of the bride lies in the eyes of the groom.
A bride is a woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
Happy is the bride that the sun shines on.
Every bride is beautiful. It’s like newborn babies or puppies. They can’t help it.
A bride will always be the belle of the ball at her own wedding.
A bride should look chaste—not caught.
You are the most beautiful bride there ever be. Don't let anyone else tell you otherwise.
You will be the most beautiful girl to the person you love even if you walk down the aisle in jeans and t-shirt.
Bride and groom are not just two contracting parties but two loving and beloved companions, joined in establishing a home that will be nothing less than a source of immortality.
A smile is the most beautiful on bride's face.
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
A million people can tell the bride that she is beautiful but the only time she will listen is when it's said by the man she loves.
There is no greater feeling than when a groom turns to see his bride and has tears in his eyes because she is so beautiful.
Nothing can make a woman look beautiful like the glow on her wedding day.
On your wedding day you should look like yourself at your most beautiful.
